featured.title: Maritime Collision
featured.description: Adds the 'Maritime Collision' custom dispute type to help in automated dispute resolution. The encoded business logic is based on the Convention for the Unification of Certain Rules of Law with respect to Collisions between Vessels.

featured.title: Divorce
featured.description: Adds the 'Divorce' custom dispute type. Coming soon.

others.title: Breach of Contract
others.description: Adds the 'Breach of Contract' custom dispute type. Coming soon.

others.title: Test Module
others.description: This module is used only in testing the SmartResolution module functionality and should not be included in the production environment.
